task.title: Remove Untranslated Units
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to remove untranslated units from a TMX file.

context.p: A translation unit that has just one <tuv> element that contains text is considered "untranslated". Untranslated units are hardly useful for retrieving matches from a Translation Memory system.

step.cmd: Open the TMX file that you want to modify.
In main menu, seect Tasks Remove Untranslated Units... .
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Remove Untranslated Units Dialog

step.cmd: Use the Source Language drop-down to select the language to be considered language for removing units (it may differ from the source language set at file level).
Click the Remove Untranslated Units button.
step.stepresult: A progress dialog is displayed while untranslated units are removed.

taskbody.result: The editing window is refreshed to reflect the changes.
